target.name: driver_factor
target.description: Driver-related factor related to the crash, as expressed by the investigating officer

features.name: fatals
features.description: Number of fatalities in the event

features.name: a_ct
features.description: type of crash: single, two-vehicle, more than 2 vehicle

features.name: a_ped_f
features.description: Whether pedestrian fatality involved in crash

features.name: a_pedal_f
features.description: Whether pedalcyclist fatality involved in crash

features.name: a_roll
features.description: Whether vehicle rollover involved in crash

features.name: a_hr
features.description: Whether hit-and-run involved in crash

features.name: a_polpur
features.description: Whether police pursuit involved in crash

features.name: month
features.description: Month of year when crash occurred

features.name: day
features.description: Day of month when crash occurred

features.name: day_week
features.description: Day of the week when crash occurred

features.name: hour
features.description: Hour of the day when crash occurred

features.name: minute
features.description: Minute in the hour when crash occurred

features.name: a_dow_type
features.description: Day of week type: weekday (M-F) or weekend (Sat-Sun)

features.name: a_tod_type
features.description: Time of day time: daytime (6 am to 6 pm), nighttime (6 pm to 6 am)

features.name: state
features.description: State in which crash occurred

features.name: a_region
features.description: Region (made up of states) where crash occurred
categories: Alabama, Florida, Georgia, South Carolina, Tennessee
Colorado, Nevada, North Dakota, South Dakota, Utah, Wyoming
Connecticut, New Jersey, New York, Pennsylvania
Delaware, District of Columbia, Kentucky, Maryland, North Carolina, Virginia, West Virginia
Illinois, Indiana, Michigan, Minnesota, Ohio, Wisconsin
Louisiana, Mississippi, New Mexico, Oklahoma, Texas
Maine, Massachusetts, New Hampshire, Rhode Island, Vermont

features.name: a_ru
features.description: Rural or urban

features.name: a_inter
features.description: Whether crash occurred on Interstate highway

features.name: a_intsec
features.description: Whether crash occurred at an intersection or not

features.name: a_roadfc
features.description: Type of road (interstate, local, etc.)
categories: Principal Arterial – Other Freeways and Expressways

features.name: a_junc
features.description: Identifies if crash occurred in or proximity to junction or interchange area of two or more roadways

features.name: a_relrd
features.description: Identifies area of roadway where crash occurred (on, off, shoulder, median, etc.)

features.name: age
features.description: Age of driver

features.name: permvit
features.description: Number of persons in motor vehicles in-transpor

features.name: pernotmvit
features.description: Number of persons not in motor vehicles in-transport

features.name: a_ped
features.description: Whether crash involved a pedestrian

features.name: ve_forms
features.description: Number of vehicle forms submitted for mv in transport

features.name: ve_total
features.description: Number of vehicle forms submitted

features.name: mod_year
features.description: Vehicle model year

features.name: a_body
features.description: Vehicle body type (automobile, light trucks, mediu/high trucks, buses, etc.)
categories: Motorcycles, Mopeds, All-Terrain Vehicles; All-Terrain Cycles

features.name: owner
features.description: Type of registered owner of vehicle in crash
categories: Driver (in this crash) Not Registered Owner (other private owner listed)
Driver (in this crash) Was Registered Owner

features.name: deaths
features.description: Number of fatalities in vehicle

features.name: numoccs
features.description: Number of motor vehicle occupants

features.name: impact1
features.description: Areas of impact - initial contact point
categories: Object set-in-motion, unknown if cargo/vehicle parts or other

features.name: deformed
features.description: Extent of damage to vehicle

features.name: weather
features.description: Prevailing atmospheric conditions that existed at the time of the crash

features.name: lgt_cond
features.description: Type/level of light that existed at the time of the crash
